LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_StablehandTrousers.label: stablehand trousers
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_StablehandTrousers.descripti: A pair of rugged trousers with suspenders. Useful for various types of farm labor.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_GentPants.label: gentleman's pants
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_GentPants.description: A very stylish pair of dress pants. Pairs perfectly with a waistcoat.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_PatchworkPants.label: patchwork pants
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_PatchworkPants.description: A very crude and ugly pair of pants.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Jeans.label: jeans
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Jeans.description: A pair of sturdy pants reinforced with copper rivets. Designed for working in the fields or in the mine.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_PrairieSkirt.label: prairie skirt
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_PrairieSkirt.description: An American style of skirt popular with pioneer women in the Old West.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_LeatherPants.label: fringe pants
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_LeatherPants.description: A pair of leather or hide pants with a fringe trim. Based on clothing worn by Native Americans, this style of pants were popular with frontiersmen for their warmth and durability.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Overalls.label: overalls
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Overalls.description: Plain pocketed overalls designed to make working more convenient. Not particularily stylish.
